title: Rare! 2-bed up unit in desirable Westpark w/parking; Avail 9/1
map_address: 3277 Rocky River Dr. near Edgecliff & Munn Avenues
posting_body: Gorgeous upstairs, second-floor unit of a high-quality, 2-family home.
Professionally updated and recently remodeled!
Beautifully maintained.
Hardwood floors in kitchen, dining, and living rooms.
Clean carpeting in the rest of the apartment with newer windows and a solid brick exterior.
Two bedrooms plus one extra bonus room (office, study, den, TV/reading room, playroom) off the second bedroom.
Living room, dining room, eat-in kitchen, one bathroom.
Kitchen appliances stay, including a new dishwasher and disposal, plus a built-in wine rack.
New Nest thermostat.
Loads of storage.
Your own newer, non-shared washer and dryer in the basement with room for extra storage.
Deep manicured back yard with large deck.
New driveway.
Detached garage with electric door opener and parking for 1 spot.

Wonderful location in highly desirable West Park neighborhood near Kamm's Shopping Plaza, Fairview Hospital, schools (Our Lady of Angels, St. Joseph's Academy, St. Mark's), airport, I-90, Lakewood, Rocky River, and Metroparks.
Also close to several churches and libraries.
Tenant responsible for all utilities, including water and sewer.
ABSOLUTELY NO PETS (only exception: service animal).
NO SMOKING.
Sorry, no Section 8 vouchers.
Minimum credit score: 675.
Subject to background check.
First month's rent, last month's rent, and security deposit all due upon signing.
Tours by appointment only.
Available Sept. 1, 2022!
